FerTilizaTion deTails are difficulT To see in This species. Look for changes in

ArTif;cial acTivaTlon

PUNCTULATA
The eggs of various sea urchins have been possibly The mosT-used classical egg
maTerial Tor embryological and physiological sTudies. The egg oT Arbacia is raTher
differenT from The eggs of mosT oTher sea urchins in being smaller and conTaining
red echinochrom granules. IT is inTeresTing To noTe (see classiTicaTion earlier)
ThaT Hyman has classified Arbacia in a difTerenT order from The oTher sea urchins
so ofTen sTudied.
